genresAdvancedInfo.name: uk post-metal
genresAdvancedInfo.description: UK post-metal is a genre that blends the heaviness and intensity of metal with the atmospheric and experimental sounds of post-rock. The music is characterized by slow, crushing riffs, ambient textures, and complex song structures that often build to epic crescendos. The vocals are often sparse or absent, allowing the music to speak for itself.
